title: It’s you
lyrics: Intro:  It’s u, it’s always u If i’m ever gonna fall in love, i know it’s gonna be u It’s u, it’s always u Met a lot of people but nobody feels like u So plz don’t break my heart Don’t tear me apart I know how it starts, trust me i’ve been broken before Don’t break me again I am delicate Plz don’t break my heart Trust me i’ve been broken before I’ve been broken yeah i know how it feels To be open and then find out ur love isn’t real I’m still hurting yeah i’m hurting inside I’m so scared to fall in love but if it’s u then i try It’s u, it’s always u If i’m ever gonna fall in love i know it’s gonna be u It’s u, it’s always u Met a lot of people but nobody feels like u So plz don’t break my heart Don’t tear me apart I know how it starts, trust me i’ve been broken before Don’t break me again I am delicate Plz don’t break my heart Trust me, i’ve been broken before I know i’m not the best at choosing lovers We both know my past speaks for itself If u don’t think that we’re right for each other Then please don’t let history repeat itself Cause i want u, i want u yeah There’s nothing else I want Cause I want u, I want u yeah And you’re the only thing I want
